params.text: The blue butterfly is flying.
The yellow bee is drinking.
A red fish is swimming.
The green frog plays with a puppy.
The orange duck swims in the pond.
The violet flower sways in the breeze.
The grey and black cat has an orange hat.
The grey and brown mouse hides in the house.
The red and black fox wears socks.
The green grasshopper reads the paper.
The black goat sails in a red boat.
The green and brown crocodile smiles.
The black and red snake eats cake.
The red and yellow hen writes.
The black and orange tiger stands.
My two black eyes see colours.

"Colours of Nature" credits

This work, "Colours of Nature", is a derivative of "Colours of Nature" written by Bulbul Sharma, used under CC BY. "Colours of Nature" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Deborah Oduman
